ar.subject: Welcome to our Portal
ar.body:
Dear _firstName_ _lastName_,


Access to the Portal has been granted for this account.

To access the portal, log in below.


Log In

Email: _email_



Should you have any more questions, please do not hesitate to get in touch with one of our representatives, and we will get back to you as soon as possible.



Please contact our team for further information.


Warmest regards,

_customerSupportName_

ar.subject: KYC ID Uploaded and Waiting for Approval
ar.body:
Dear _firstName_ _lastName_,

We would like to inform you that your ID document have been uploaded successfully and will be evaluated by the relevant department within 24 business hours

Should you have any further inquires, do not hesitate to get in touch with our Customer Support. Our team will be more than happy to assist you.

Thank you for choosing Accuindex as your trusted broker.

Sincerely,
Accuindex Team

en.subject: Deposit Received Pending
en.body:
Dear _firstName_ _lastName_,

We are pleased to inform you that your deposit of _amount_ _currency_ has been received, and is now pending to be approved, once it is approved, it will be transferred to your wallet.
Should you have further enquiries, do not hesitate to get in touch with one of our representatives, and we will get back to you as soon as possible

Warmest regards,
_customerSupportName_

If you did not request to open an account, please ignore this email.
